chart_metadata.description: Cert-Manager is a kubernetes-aware certificate manager
chart_metadata.name: cert-manager

groups.name: Container Image
groups.description: Image to be used for container

groups.name: Networking and Services
groups.description: Configure Network and Services for Container

groups.name: Storage and Persistence
groups.description: Persist and Share Data that is Separate from the Container

groups.name: Resources and Devices
groups.description: Specify Resources/Devices to be Allocated to Workload

attrs.label: Stop All
attrs.description: Stops All Running pods and hibernates cnpg

attrs.label: DNS01 Recursive Nameservers (Modifications are unsupported)
attrs.description:
Comma separated list of DNS servers to use for recursive
name resolution when performing DNS01 challenges.
Default is: 1.1.1.1:53,1.0.0.1:53 </br>
If this is modified, you are NOT covered by support.

attrs.label: DNS01 Recursive Nameservers Only (Modifications are unsupported)
attrs.description:
Forces cert-manager to only use the recursive nameservers for verification.
Enabling this option could cause the DNS01 self check to take longer
due to caching performed by the recursive nameservers.
Default is: false </br>
If this is modified, you are NOT covered by support.

4.5.3.app_readme:
Cert-Manager is a kubernetes-aware certificate manager

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/operators/cert-manager

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
4.5.3.detailed_readme:
title: README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project

1.1.11.app_readme:
Cert-Manager is a kubernetes-aware certificate manager

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/operators/cert-manager

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
1.1.11.detailed_readme:
README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
